OGC API - Records
Discovering geospatial data on the web
Tell Me More Get Started

Ensure your data is not buried in the deep web

It is estimated that more than 90% of the web content is not indexed by search engines. This includes content that is intentionally hidden such as private repositories, but also some organisation specific repositories, academic databases and government reports.

Do you create geospatial resources, like data, services or ML models? OGC API – Records gives you Standard interfaces to expose your resources and a Standard vocabulary to describe them.

This description will make sure that search engines will index the resources in a structured way, so that humans and machines can find them, understand their descriptions and fetch them, if they want to.

Copyright © 2024. Open Geospatial Consortium all rights reserved
Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy

OGC API Features does not log or share your personal information.

We don't track you. We don't profile you. Period
